website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural body oil that is ideal for use on sensitive skin.
cons: More expensive than the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works!! I used to be a gym fanatic but have been chronically ill for 3+ years leaving me unable to be physical. I’m nearing 30 and my butt and legs have noticeable cellulite from my now sedentary lifestyle. After 2 weeks of use, my husband grabbed my butt and said hey have you been doing any exercises?! Noticeably firmer butt and less cellulite. Love this stuff. Also super hydrating so I use it all over my skin.
customer_reviews.author: ksmith024Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Favorite massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Excellent massage oil recommended by a friend who is a masseuse. Absorbs well into the skin during massage, just enough glide without feeling too greasy, and the subtle herbal scent from the arnica plant is pleasant. The properties of arnica are helpful for sore muscles and arthritis, and much appreciated by this creaky 65 year old woman.
customer_reviews.author: avid rita

customer_reviews.title: Keep this on hand for bad sprains and hurt muscles!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for years! The end of Oct I severely sprained my ankle and had to be in a special boot. I turned to this arnica oil [with a bit of castor oil] as well as arnica 200C homeopathic pellets. My ankle healed very quickly and there has not been the long recovery time predicted by my doctor and others who have had similar bad sprains. "Oh, this will take longer to heal than a break!" Gee, thanks! But in four weeks, I feel I was completely healed. I attribute this to using the arnica oil and under the tongue homeopathic arnica. I used the arnica oil at least two times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Selby

customer_reviews.title: Using right after I shower is the best way I find
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the products I have used this one is a keeper. It has helped a lot with my cellulite on my legs. To be honest it hasn't cleared it all up but I would say 85% in the short time I have used this. Using right after I shower is the best way I find. So if all others have failed please give this a try you will be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: mary maddox

customer_reviews.title: This works GREAT on old crepey facial skin
customer_reviews.text: This works GREAT on old crepey facial skin. Helped to create a more youthful appearance. This is my new facial moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Scholtus

customer_reviews.title: ... never noticed any changes-though my skin didn't get any worse either. But
customer_reviews.text: For over a year I used natural vitamin E oil on my face and neck and never noticed any changes-though my skin didn't get any worse either. But, I decided to try this out and within two weeks my skin tone greatly improved. My husband noted I'm "glowing". I've now been using it for 2 months and still love it. I'm noticing less dark spots and my scars have reduced in size. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: It has a very mild herbal smell which I like and it actually warms up when you apply it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and packaged very well just as described and pleasantly surprised that it was a glass bottle. I use this product to help with my sore muscles and bruises from fascia blasting and this definitely works! It has a very mild herbal smell which I like and it actually warms up when you apply it and massage sore spot. The photo is just one day of using this oil applied twice after blasting in after noon and again right before bedtime and next morning the photo shows how much it faded and they are not sore to the touch. Been using this product for a month and has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Whole Foods has this priced at the store for $22 Amazon has it for $10 great value. This is some really good massage oil I use it to massage my wife's back and my sore muscles after vigourous run. Very soothing
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Repairs crepe-like skin!
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer posted, this does tighten crepey skin! I used it all over my neck, face, chest and it’s even tightened some lax skin around my eyelids! Might save me a surgery down the road! The scent is amazing, but I didn’t find this product to be super hydrating. I mix it with either Shea or Cocoa butter and that does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: LC1977

customer_reviews.title: I used this my entire pregnancy and never had stretch marks!!
customer_reviews.text: I feared having stretch marks when I got pregnant. I used this oil my whole pregnancy and never got a single stretch mark on my stomach! I was shocked. Yes it is oily and I applied it after every shower which was twice a day, but it was worth it. I looked and felt like a basted turkey but it paid off in the end! this picture was taken at 8 months. it smells good too which was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: House OF Yorkies

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My massage therapist used this when treating my whip lash. She told me she also used on bruises. I had a bruise the diameter of a baseball on my wrist and hand. Massaged this in for 2 nights and it disappeared. I use it when my feet are tired from a long day working an event too
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Stinks but works
customer_reviews.text: After 4 weeks use, I can say the oil definitely does the job of reducing cellulite on tights. Also, it is slowly taking away a bean-size cyst I have had for more than 5Y; the cyst has turned into a pea-size after 4 weeks use.
customer_reviews.author: Monik O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has been amazing during pregnancy! I began using it and noticed my stretch marks from my first pregnancy lightened up quite a bit. It also helps with minimizing itchiness! I had run out and waited a few weeks to order another bottle and my stretch marks became darker again. It hasn't prevented me from getting new ones this pregnancy (I don't think there's any way around it), but I'm hoping to use it after pregnancy in hopes it keeps my stretch marks light and not as visible! The only con is that my husband says he doesn't like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After II first used this I have completely switched over ...
customer_reviews.text: After II first used this I have completely switched over to this body oil from lotion. It makes my skin glow unlike I have ever seen and it absorbs very fast, unlike coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Quick absorbing and very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I’m 7 months pregnant and this has been one of my top 10 most have items for my pregnancy so far. Who knows if it will save me from stretch marks by the very end (I’ll update my review), but I have had zero itching, no breakouts, and no stretch marks. It absorbs pretty fast (about 5 min and then I’m no longer greasy). The smell is a bit much for me personally, but it’s a minimal trade off and doesn’t smell after I leave the bathroom. I use morning and evening. Only downside is it’s pricey and you go through a bottle quickly, but worth every penny so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best product for skin issues
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product. Took care of roscea breakouts and brought my skin back to normal. Nice and smooth and healthy looking. It also took care of a pigment change in a small area of my face. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: BTD'er

customer_reviews.title: I heard about it and it turned out be great
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this from multiple friends. Some used it for bone related pains while others used it for muscle pains. I am not a doctor so frankly I do not know what is actually cures (reduces pain) better. I tried it and it feels a little warm (not much) and comforting when you apply the oil. A relative (doctor) who is an arthritis patient thinks this is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Should Have This In Their Medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for well over a decade after falling in a foreign country and being unable to get any pain mediation at the pharmacy there. The German pharmacist recommended this and said it was a standard product in most German households for bruising and strain. It worked like a charm and I use it for everything. If you are prone to bruising this will not only eliminate pain (not immediately but quickly) it will also help to lighten the discoloration of a bruise quickly. If you are bruise prone, as I am. this is a really nice feature. I've never noticed the smell so if you do not like strong smells this should not bother you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and really works great on stubborn Cellulite. Be consistent with the application of the product and you will see results.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Effective for cellulite on thighs and butt!
customer_reviews.text: Wow just wow! I did not believe there was any product out there for cellulite truly. But this does a sincere, decent job of smoothing out cellulite on my butt and thighs! The dimples look a lot diminished when I apply this! Some reviewer was right that it doesn’t get rid of completely but more like 80%. I’ve used it 3 days continuously, and will continue applying on a daily basis. Who knows maybe it will smooth it all out 100%??!
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: After using this religiously for close to 2 years, I can attest that it works on cellulite. It took me quite a long while before seeing results though.
customer_reviews.author: wivinia soo

customer_reviews.title: No difference in my stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have been using this oil for over a month. Being 31 weeks pregnant, I have been getting huge stretch marks so I was hoping to avoid more using this oil. I have not personally seen a difference with using this oil, so for stretch marks, I will not be purchasing again. If you are looking for an oil to moisturize your skin and are worried about your skin breaking out, mine has been fine and it breaks out with nearly everything. I would only recommend for moisturizing but not stretch marks
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and absorbs into the skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since college and I absolutely love it! Smells wonderful and absorbs into the skin and really feels soothing for tight and sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbowlovechild

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cellulite oil I try. I try different kind of oils or lotion I usually didn't finish using them. I've been using this for two days already in my whole body, especially in my belly and waistline. I mix it with my stretch mark lotion together, even without lotion; it is turn out better. Honestly, it is smooth and silky, and it's not oily. My skin is soft and supple. I will stay in this oil, and I'm not going to use another brand anymore. I ordered the cream as well but haven't tried.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Will use again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I will always recommend this oil. I used 4 bottles throughout my whole pregnancy and didn’t get 1 single stretch mark. I had a baby 14 years ago and didn’t take care of my skin (I was 21) and thought I was doomed for my new pregnancy. I used the oil day after shower and night after shower and my skin looks wonderful and even made my stomach look better!! I also loved the calming smell. Highly recommend and bought this any pregnant momma I know who worries about the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: massge oil g fragrant
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOVED this product, have been using Weleda products for many years , made in germany, and especially their massage oils are very good quality. one is a herbal one for sore joints and thi8s one is a fragraqnt one , wild roses , and is wonderful for an intimate massage or just plain realaxing massage,,,the fragrance is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: romy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice a day everyday from 4 months on in my pregnancy. I dont have a single stretch mark. A huge part of it genetic. However I think this helped a lot with my skin stretching and retracting.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Fig

customer_reviews.title: No Stretch Marks So Far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used it in combo with the Burts Bees Mama Bee Belly Butter. I like that it's not too strong of a fragrance. My friend who is prone to stretch marks highly recommended this product from her pregnancy. (She didn't end up getting any marks, which is a great endorsement).
customer_reviews.author: EYO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. .. Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is unbelievable it's so incredibly good. It's not cheap but, is awesome. Your skin will thank you. Update 4/27/2020 . I had severe dry skin on my legs. I used this stuff once on it, and they were incredibly soft and smooth and stayed that way. You don't need a lot either. Just little bits at a time. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E Peacock

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this oil. It makes your skin SO soft. I’ve never felt a difference in my skin like this. I have stretch marks on my thighs and butt so I’ve been looking for something to fade them a bit. I haven’t seen any significant differences in those areas yet but maybe I’ll need to use it for a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: What an interesting combo
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try out some of the different Weleda oils because to buy whole bottles is expensive. Yes, per ounce, these were also pricey but I got to try out 6 different types of product. They all have their specialty use. It is too bad that they don't give some details about each oil in the package. I had to get my info online by looking up each oil.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I used it everyday right after the shower on damp skin all over my body. The bottle lasted about 6 weeks. It has a fresh scent. Bonus...It also seemed to keep the mosquitoes away.
customer_reviews.author: g.mac

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: I did not see the fragnance on the ingredients list on Amazon but apparently it has it. Smells so heavy like cheap room odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looooove the scent and the texture of the oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! It’s so pleasant and I enjoyed putting it on my belly every day! I used it from the beginning of both of my pregnancies. My first son was born at 37 weeks and I was fine, no stretch marks. My second son was born at 39 weeks and unfortunately those two extra weeks left on my belly stretch marks. I’m sure it helped me in certain way but it wasn’t prevented all the way so I am currently using scar creams to try to hide them. Overall great product! Will use again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful scent!
customer_reviews.text: Started using Weleda Pomegranate deodorant , and I ADORE the scent, but as a deodorant, it's meh. Kept using it though because I'm addicted to the scent. Imagine my delight to find out Weleda also has a pomegranate scented body oil, hand cream, body lotion, and body wash! I bought them all. This body oil is my favorite of the lot. I've started putting a few squirts into my bathwater, and it works beautifully to moisturize my skin. Also great as a massage oil. Scent has citron and licorice notes underneath the pomegranate aroma. Pomegranate scent itself is hard to describe, think a very natural blackberry/cherry/plum sort of scent, but not at all cloying.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible - may put off those suffering from morning sickness
customer_reviews.text: While this may help prevent stretch marks, unfortunately I did not get a chance to fully try out the product. It smells atrocious esp. for someone like me who is suffering from morning sickness and cannot stomach most smells and odors. Not sure why the product makers did not take this into account and create an unscented version. To make matters worse, this product cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back pain and painful arthritis in my feet and hands. On my bad days this oil makes my pain level go down almost to unnoticable. I recommend this product it is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B

customer_reviews.title: Less Toxins by far!!! Top product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is very moisturizing and a little goes a long way. It has minimal toxins which is always a nice plus. The fragrance is a bit strong but not awful. Worth the buy for sure and I've even been using it to moisturize my face since it has gotten so dry this pregnancy and not in else has seemed to help with it. I will be purchasing more when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wills

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain and massages!
customer_reviews.text: I really love all of the oils in this kit! I have numerous health issues so my wonderful, amazing husband gives me massages almost daily. I was having a hard time finding a good massage oil at the store that didn’t have such a strong odor or thick consistency. The smells are great and he loves how it feels when rubbing it in. It absorbs well without drying up too fast during the longer massages. The muscle arnica oil really helps my achy legs and feet. We both noticed a difference in my skin from only a few weeks of use. I’ll definitely keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Soaks into my skin nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I used this oil very early on in my pregnancy, so I’m not sure how well it worked with preventing stretch marks, but I do love how easy it is to apply without feeling extremely oily afterward. I’ve used other oils that just kind of sit on your skin for a few minutes and then are good. Within a few seconds of applying it it soaks right in and I can throw on my pj’s without worrying about ruining my shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil smells great and it actually WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells great and it actually WORKS. I have tried every cellulite product on the market and this one is tops.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent one for stretch marks for pregnant women, but there may be stains on clothes.
customer_reviews.text: +Great oil for stretch marks! I'm using the 4th jar now. It moisturizes and softens the skin well. - But there is one drawback that it is too greasy and can leave stains on clothes and bedding. I recommend wiping off what is not absorbed. I haven’t found anything to replace this oil yet, but sorry for the spoiled clothes. +++ now the 9th month of pregnancy, no stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and left smell on clothes
customer_reviews.text: Used this for most of my pregnancy, morning and night. Didn't prevent any stretch marks and left an awful waxy smell on all of the clothes I wore after putting it on. The product itself smells good, but it's really in the fibers of my clothes and I can't get it out. It's especially in my pajama tops from wearing them more often and using it nightly. Pretty big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I specifically came looking for this and it didn't disappoint. It doesn't have the exact same scent as the last one I bought but it's still nice and herbally. The smell is possibly my favorite part but it also works great for massaging. Very smooth and absorbs without being greasy or gunky. Love this stuff! I've even put it on my face to soften my skin and it has never lead to a breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Mia bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: What's Not To Love?
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about Weleda? Everything they make is wonderful! I'm a huge lover of organic oils, and I use this beneficial oil all over my body. Scent is wonderful and keeps my skin looking youthful and healthy. I love Weleda oils!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaPeach

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have severe bound-up muscles due to Fibromyalgia & Peripheral NeNeuropathy. My daughter bought me my 1st bottle...now, I will never ever be w/o this product! I ordered 2 bottles of this and, when 1 bottle is low I buy another bottle. Scent is great, m8oisturizing w/o leaving skin feeling oily. I use this as a "carrier" oil in conjunction with an EO "Muscle Calm" 🤗
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: I use it for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I rub in the oil to relieve pain on my right side from the shoulder blade to below the hip caused by spinal deterioration. It's not a cure-all but it does help reduce the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Life is good!

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road quality
customer_reviews.text: The price was right for this set of oils, but the scents were disappointing & kind of artificial. I mixed a few to try on massage clients & while I had no issues with sensitivity, a few reported some mild irritation and acne at sites where it was used. I also had to use more oil than usual during massages. Great for trial & to try mixing oils, but not for longer term use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. I'm 5 months pregnant and the cold weather and extra hot showers I've been taking have made my skin unbearably itchy and almost scaly. I was very cautious as to what brand of product I'd be slathering on myself but I know Weleda is good stuff and so I didn't think twice after seeing this listed as a recommendation on a beauty website. I'm glad I ordered it! - it's not greasy and leaves my skin so soft, and I totally love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: CMCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It smells gorgeous and is relaxing on top of taking away pain. I have chronic pain and injuries and this works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s not oily or sticky, which I have had that experience with other butter rubs. Have been using this twice a day to keep my skin from being so itchy, and it really calms it down. Plus it smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: alexandra navarrette

customer_reviews.title: Not everything that shine is gold...
customer_reviews.text: I used it in the 9 months of my pregnancy and i have so many stretch marks like i never used this oil... i use it 2 times per day + other oil for stretch marks and creams too...nothing combined it helped... so dont assume just because you see alot rating that means that it will work for you... try other at the same time for possible better results.
customer_reviews.author: Mystik13

customer_reviews.title: Pampering...
customer_reviews.text: Very pampering...If you can't afford Weleda facial products, this is pure enough to use on your face...Love it!...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones-Giampalo

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I see reviews about the smell but I actually love the smell! It goes on nice and absorbs quickly. I'm 30 weeks and so far havent seen any new stretch marks. During my first pregnancy I bought an expensive brand and still became a tiger and now I wish I found this product years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice body oil with a heavier texture. Moisturizing. Weleda is s great brand. I took off one star because there wasn't a noticeable rise scent.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not to treat cellulite
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for my cellulite, but makes my skin so soft and moistured, that it's worthy as moisturizer. It has a lemony smell that may bother some people, but it didn't bother me. It's fast absorbed by the skin.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but not a magic solution.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this form the beginning of my pregnancy. It keeps my skin soft and I guess my stretch mark to a minimum, but its not a magic solution. The only way to avoid stretch marks is not to gain any weight, and that is pretty much impossible during pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Smoother skin
customer_reviews.text: I notice a difference in my skin when I use this product. However when you stop using the product, the cellulite comes back in few months. Have to use it consistently to maintain results.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective & Unpleasant!
customer_reviews.text: This oil doesn’t improve muscle soreness whatsoever! And it smells really unpleasant compared to the other Weleda oils I’ve tried! And, believe me, I’ve tried them all and been a satisfied customer of this wonderful brand! However, I’m really disappointed with this specific oil. Especially, because this is an ‘unreturnable’ item. Trust me, don’t buy this product and safe yourself the money and the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: EvVvA

customer_reviews.title: Great oil. Could use a better pump
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oil almost my entire pregnancy and no stretch marks. The scent is light but pleasant and absorbs nicely. No greasy residue on my clothes. The only think I would recommend changing is the pump. The way it pumps out it often creates a mess. But I make due bc the oil has been worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this oil! I use it at night before bed, usually right after a shower. I haven’t had any stretch marks throughout my pregnancy, I’m currently 33 weeks. It’s moisturizer but light enough that it doesn’t leave that thick oily feeling and hasn’t left any residue on my clothes. I don’t know if I’d use it in the morning before getting dressed but at night I’m not worried about my sleep shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green Glass Container free from plastic
customer_reviews.text: I like the properties of the oil..the scent is very soothing, it calms me down and smells nicely, does not cause allergies and is store in a green glass container thatbis safe from any plastic toxicity. I do recommend this natural scented German oil.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using various Weleda products for a couple of years now and I especially like their diaper cream for my son. I bought the assorted oils sampler and decided that I really liked this particular one and ordered a large bottle. While the oil is excellent I am unable to use it because the top has broken off and I can’t fix it. I also can’t return it because it would leak everywhere. Bummer that I spent so much on something I can’t use
customer_reviews.author: Emily Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Looks and smells fake. I don’t think this is an authentic Weleda product
customer_reviews.text: Welles’s is a tired and true company. This massage oil is soothing and smells great. Totally natural and goes nicely into the skin. The smell is relaxing and I always have a bottle handy. Great on the feet before bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: All natural
customer_reviews.text: Weleda hydrating body oil sea buckthorn. I use this on my body. It’s not too greasy and leaves my skin soft and hydrated. Great as a massage oil. I love All Weleda products! I want to try the type that is good for muscle aches.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like roses
customer_reviews.text: This has a strange smell! Somewhat medicinal, the rose smell is overwhelmed by the smell of the is themselves. I added it to my lotion and it serves a purpose, since it is mostly jojoba oil it is still a good oil, but don't buy it for it's smell because if you love rose oil like I do you will be super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Saw this as a suggestion online to help keep stretch marks and itchy skin at bay during pregnancy. Within a day of using, I started developing this awful dry and painful irritation all over my stomach. I've discontinued using for a few weeks now and am struggling. I still have discolored spots all over my stomach that are extremely dry and painful at times no matter what else I put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly and runs in well
customer_reviews.text: I am 16weeks pregnant and am loving this oil! The smell is a. It strong but it is so lovely that I do not much mind. It also fades quickly. The oil runs in well without getting residue on my clothing and I use it head to toe.
customer_reviews.author: MomaboveAll

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but I wish it were a bit stronger - maybe had more arnica to help with pain relief. It does seem to moisturize and feels good when applying after the shower. I use it around my knees and ankles. I workout and it doesn't really help with soreness.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: oooohhh myyyyy Gooodddddd
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love!!! I have combination skin, dry patches but oily in other places. I put this on after the shower and it absorbs quick, I love the smell (some might not) and my skin is sooo soft and moisturized. Definitely will be buying this for forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Prevention stretches
customer_reviews.text: during my gestation i bought this oil several times, i keep using it in breastfeeding until my body goes back to normal, prevented stretch marks and super hydrates
customer_reviews.author: Simone Lopes Roque

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Massage Oil
customer_reviews.text: Smells and feels great. Very soothing, you can feel it working deep in your muscles. I use it often on my shoulders instead of constantly taking Ibuprofen. It helps me sleep better as well. My boyfriend loves it too, we will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak scents
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, all were weak scents, wanted to add it to some Germ x hand sanitizer, but used almost a whole bottle, and could hardly tell I added any scent. way too pricey for such weak oils
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it is an oil so expect that consistency. I have heard that is best for absorption and moisturizing! I put it on nightly after my bath, and the scent is very gentle and the oil is smooth, no issues with sensitivity so far and I do tend to have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by a friend and it was a scent that was pleasant for me. I tried bio-oil but I didn't really like the smell. I felt that this oil absorbed better than the bio-oil.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It smells very good. I see results very slowly, but well worth it. It goes first so I have to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Loved these body oil didn’t use it every night more like a week oil and was great prevented from getting stretch marks for me. Not a every day must but did use it weekly
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Quality Scent from Weleda
customer_reviews.text: These small scents have lasted a long time and are small and convenient to tuck in places you need them, when you need them. I would purchase again due to the variety and QUALITY of the oils and scents. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gormley

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This oil is exceptional! The scent is calming and the oil is not greasy. My husband and I use this to give each other massages to avoid getting sore hands and sensitive skin. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Working Class Family

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I adore this oil. It does smell like rosemary more than arnica to me but still very soothing. Wouldn’t recommend if your not into smells. I use this oil on my clients over a warming cbd ointment and they go to another planets! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best pain relief products that I have purchased. Just apply a small amount on the affected area and wow the pain is gone almost instantly. Thank you! Tom
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 32 weeks. I got some stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: It's my third bottle and 32 weeks of pregnancy. I got a little bit of stretch marks actually and 8 more weeks to go. I apply twice daily and don't use anything besides. I love the pump at new bottle design. It's much easier .
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil, smells so delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite-smelling massage oil. It smells like a pine tree forest. I use it on massage clients who complain of sore muscles. It's a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burns

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, i used a lot of different creams to get rid of cellulite. One of my friends recommended this product and it works great. I used 1.5 bottles of it until i got rid of all my cellulite. Will definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Bottles Mostly Empty
customer_reviews.text: Love Weleda products but this item is a ripoff. Most of the bottles included in this pack of 6 were practically empty. There was maybe 1/2 teaspoon is most bottles. There was no oil on the outside of the packaging and the bottles were factory sealed so the oil did not leak out during shipping and handling. The bottles were purposely not filled. I would definitely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Huron

customer_reviews.title: I have been making my own cream with this oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my own cream with this oil for twenty years. Arnica and birch are antinflamnatory. Any place you hurt the cream, or oil, takes the swelling down.
customer_reviews.author: marcia freed

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent & Super Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Has a really nice herbal scent and keeps my skin hydrated all day. I have not noticed the anit-cellulite effects yet, but have only used for one week.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Buys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for very sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very herb-ish but lovely & calming. This soaks right into the skin to moisturize beautifully. Was surprised that so little goes so far, have to use less of this for a full body massage 💆 than I would with lotions or other oils.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: All good, but the cost doubled
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine. Shipped in time. Only problem is, I want to order it again... but the cost has doubled since February of this year.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Favorite oil!
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is soft and nice and it's easy to use everyday. I think the texture is perfect and I don't need to care wearing my clothes after putting this oil. I also like the bottle design.
customer_reviews.author: Mim278

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make a difference for me yet
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice a difference in cellulite from one bottle but it is a great price and product maybe I need to use a few more bottles bc there must be a reason it’s a cult classic
customer_reviews.author: Rae A

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok not the best oil.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t really sink into the skin too well takes a looong while , also I saw no difference in strechmarks fading or decreasing in newer ones. I recommend Herbivore oils instead.
customer_reviews.author: Walleda

customer_reviews.title: Feel too oily, though has effects
customer_reviews.text: I feel it may help prevent stretch marks. But I feel it is too "fat", which I mean oily. I only used 1/6 of the bottle during my pregnancy due to the uncomfortable feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jack See

customer_reviews.title: love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing oil, massage and absorb well on tummy, don't know if it helps with stretch mark yet, but sure love the smell
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil but no results
customer_reviews.text: Really like the scent but can’t say that I saw any visible results after using whole bottle. It’s just nice oil but don’t expect miracles from it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Desertsnow

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine but
customer_reviews.text: Mostly Sunflower oil with the scent of Arnica plus others. Best to know what you’re buying. Typical miss direction.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and isn’t heavy! First time using so haven’t noticed any cellulite reduction but I plan on sticking to a regiment of applying everyday. Comes in a glass bottle with a spray top.
customer_reviews.author: Memequotes

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why but so far it isn't working for me. I've only had it a little over a week now and the bottle is a 3rd of the way empty already. It says use a couple of drops but that isn't even enough to cover my knee caps is soaks right up. I am using it right after the shower before toweling off. The first couple days it was great! But then each day my skin felt more dry than the next. Very weird. It does smell nice, but for the price I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R.

customer_reviews.title: Magical oil. Not a single stretch mark
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6 days postpartum and not a single stretch mark from this pregnancy due to this magical oil. I used it once a day starting at 9 weeks pregnant all the way to the end. I would say to use as much as you want. I also used it in my chest area as they were starting to grow in size and that can cause stretch marks too. DH looked at my stomach today and was pleasantly surprised that I did not have a single stretch mark. Yes, it’s a bit pricy, but worth every penny. One bottle lasted between 1-1.5 months for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patty H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT Sept 2019
customer_reviews.text: This stuff it amazing. I’m 32 weeks pregnant and have been desperately using any and all locations I could fined. Nothing ever kept the itchy stretched tummy at ease. I used this last night and tonight for the first times. It lasted all day and the smell is very calming. I will definitely buy this for any pregnant friend I have.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan J Rose

product_meta.title: Weleda Pampering Body & Beauty Oil, 3.4 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Scent:Wild Rose| Size:3.4 OunceEverything about the rose is harmonious, especially her balance between flourishing growth and delicate beauty, sensual summer fragrance and vibrant autumn fruit. That harmony of beauty and endurance is captured in this indulgent body oil. The precious floral oil of wild roses is carefully blended with hydrating sweet almond and jojoba oil. Your skin glows with silky radiance while the intoxicating scent of damask roses transform the moment.
feature_bullets: Contains 1 - 3.4 Ounce Pampering Body & Beauty Oil
High in essential fatty acids, supports the natural functions of skin.
Harmonizes the body and spirit for skin that feels luminous, soft and revitalized.
Dermatologically tested. Certified natural by NATRUE.
Free from synthetic preservative, fragrance, color or raw materials from mineral oils.
